about.title: About us - EasyImage
about.description: Learn the background of EasyImage, we provide free and efficient image processing tools, aiming to provide users with convenient image processing services.
about.keywords: About us, EasyImage, simple pictures, image processing, free tools

offer.heading: What We Offer
content: EasyImage provides free online tools for image processing. We offer a variety of features to help you modify and optimize your images without any cost.
There are no paid features or subscriptions available on our website.

privacy.heading: Privacy and Security
content: We respect your privacy. Our website does not store any personal information or account details.
All operations are performed directly in the browser, meaning no user files are uploaded to external servers.

functionality.heading: Functionality
content: Since our tools are browser-based, the performance of the tools depends on your computer's capabilities.
We cannot guarantee the availability or performance of the tools, as their functionality is subject to the websiteâ€™s configuration and your device.

support.heading: No Technical Support
content: We do not provide technical support for the tools. However, all functions are available on the website, and they work as expected based on the browser environment.

contact.heading: Contact Us
content: If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to reach out to us.

language.heading: Multi-Language Support
content: EasyImage is available in multiple languages. However, please note that not all languages are guaranteed to be supported. Please refer to the website for the language options available.
